definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

sentences.english: The rafters, spaced at approximately 80cm centers, are nailed to the purlin.
sentences.chinese: 椽子釘在連繫樑上，中心間距爲80釐米。

sentences.english: Maintaining close community ties through participating wide-ranging activities.
sentences.chinese: 旅發局透過參與不同活動，與社會各界保持連繫。

sentences.english: Linking verbs are followed by a subject complement .
sentences.chinese: 連繫動詞之後須帶主語補語。

sentences.english: Where may I check in for United flight number 706?
sentences.chinese: 我該到哪裏辦連繫航空706次班機登機手續？

sentences.english: Paul wanted them to be knit together in love.
sentences.chinese: 保羅期望他們能用愛心互相連繫起來。

sentences.english: It reflects a chain-like interconnection between quantities .
sentences.chinese: 它反映了諸量之間的一種鏈式的連繫。

sentences.english: At the lower end of each roof slope, eaves purlins are provided over the ceiling joists.
sentences.chinese: 屋面兩坡的下方，檐口的連繫梁支承在平頂擱柵之上。

sentences.english: This year is the year of mid-term review of the UN Millennium Development Goals (MDGs).
sentences.chinese: 今年是連繫國千年成長方針中期審評年。

sentences.english: This being is linked or connected to the higher "I" from the point of Anthroposophy.
sentences.chinese: 這個存在體是跟人智學中的高層次的”我“連繫的。

sentences.english: I have a good bond with others in on-line brand community.
sentences.chinese: 我在虛擬品牌社區中與其他人有很好的連繫。

sentences.english: If you have any questions, please contact your insurance agent.
sentences.chinese: 如有任何疑問請連繫您的保險代理人。

sentences.english: For connection to occur, something powerful must touch something good.
sentences.chinese: 要有連繫出現，就必須有一股力量觸發美善。

sentences.english: The United Nations Security Council is charged with the maintenance of international peace and security.
sentences.chinese: 連繫國理事會負有維持國際寂靜與的責任。

sentences.english: I'll look to one of my classroom experiences to answer this one.
sentences.chinese: 我將連繫我的一項課堂教學實踐來解答這個問題。

sentences.english: Through that thread you are related to the body, and through that thread also you are related to your soul.
sentences.chinese: 經由那條線你與身體連繫，也同時與你的靈魂連結。

sentences.english: This domain name was expired; please contact with your service provider to renew it.
sentences.chinese: 這個域名已經過期，請連繫域名註冊商進行續用。

definition: connection/contact/relation/to get in touch with/to integrate/to link/to touch
to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
to join/to connect/to link up/to communicate
variant of 關係|关系[guan1 xi5]
to coordinate/to harmonize/to fit together/to match (colors etc)/harmonious/concerted
to maintain/to keep up/to hold together
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
